description: ff. 82. 229 x 150; 190 x 120 mm. 25 lin. Shaʻbān 846. The author completed his Shifāʼ al-sudūr fī īḍāḥ al-bayān ʻan kashf ḥaqāʼiq al-burhān fī aʻlām nubūwat al-Rasūl (cf. Ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 1050) in 15 volumes after 30 years of labor. From this work he made the present abridgment by selecting ten chapters: ... وخلصت منه ابوابا عشرة فىما منحه الله من الخواص دون سائر البشر Ṭalas, al-Kashshāf, 556 (author called Salmān). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الواحد الذى لا ىتبعض من الاعداد
author: Sabtī, Sulaymān ibn al-Sabʻ, 15th cent
creator: Sabtī, Sulaymān ibn al-Sabʻ, 15th cent
subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, d. 632—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
